Translations.Text: hananim-i malsseumhasa du sin-eul seomgiji malla sillo sin-eun hananim bakk-en eobsnani naman-eul dulyeowohala
cheonjiui modeun geos-i geu bun-egegwisogdoeeo iss-eo i modeun geos-i hangsang-geubunkke sunjonghageoneul neohuineun hana nim-oee daleun geos-eul dulyeowo handan mal-inyo
neohuiege bepul-eojineun modeun eunhyeneun hananim-eulobuteo oneun geos-eulo neohuiege gonan-i iss-eul ttae geubun-egeman guwonhala
geulihayeo junimkkeseo neohuiui gonan-eul jegeohasa bola neohui gaun de mulineun junim-eul seomgimae daleunsin eul biyuhayeo seong-gini
ineun hananim-i geudeul-ege be pun eunhyeleul bulsinhan geos-ila hyanglagha la neohuiga god alge doelila
geudeul-eun hananim-i bepun yangsig eulo alji mushaneun usang-e mogs-eul bunbaehani hananimkke maengsehageondae neo huineun neohuiga geojishan geos deul-e gwanhayeo jilmun-eul bad-eulila
geudeul-eun hananimkke ttaldeul-i iss da hani geubunkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo geudeul-eun geudeul-i wonhaneun geos-i issdeo la
geudeul gaunde han salam-i yeoa ga tansaenghaessdaneun sosig-eul deul-eoss-eul ttae geuui eolgul-i geom-eojimyeo seulpeum-eulo gadeug chadeola

geuege jeonhaeon nappeun sosig-eu lo geuneun suchiseuleowo salamdeullobuteo jasin-eul sumgimyeo geu chiyog-eul cham-eul geos inga animyeon \xCD sog-e mud-eo beolil geos-inga saeng-gaghayeossnani geudeul-i pan danhan geos-e bolhaeng-i iss-eulila
saagham-eul biyuhasa ineun nae seleul midji anihan jala hananim-eun biyuhal su eobsneun gajang nop-eun gos-e gyesinani geubun-eun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila
